Install necessary packages in RStudio:
```{r setup, eval=F}
install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("flowCore")
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Close-your-eyes/fcexpr")
library(fcexpr)
```

In order to plot the data from a flowjo workspace (event counts or MFI) meta data to the FCS files have to be provided. To avoid that respective tables are created individually (~with different formats) for every single experiment and to make the process time-efficient the sync_sampledescription function may be used.
